description:
Prevención  de conflictos, desarrollo de acuerdos y construcción de la paz 
en comunidades con personas internamente desplazadas en Chiapas, México (2009-2011)

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Displaced persons in Chiapas are the forgotten victims of the conflict between Zapatism and the Mexican State. The aim of the programme is to strengthen capacities for reducing conflict and tension in Chiapas, by implementing the Special Rapporteur’s recommendations and thus benefiting 24 communities with internally displaced persons.

An integral process is proposed, which involves strengthening the criminal justice system and a culture of peace and local human development in the following regions of Chiapas: Altos, Norte and Selva. The programme has three areas: 1) Promoting public policies for strengthening the rule of law and the MDGs, using three indicators systems; 2) Institutional development of the criminal justice and penal systems and general security, based on local analyses; and 3) Strengthening local and state capacities for the reduction and non-violent resolution of conflicts and the construction of a culture of peace.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Prevención  de conflictos

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
